930ade40-b518-4b8e-8c2d-552e608458a6 | lsc = | icon = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}, used for Dunnage random encounters. One notable use is in the quest [[A Tidy Performance]], where you will be accosted by four thugs lead by [[Eamund the Fox]], and placed in this location.
title: Shanty Street
